Description

NIO implementation of a SMTP client

Authors

Norman Maurer (norman@apache.org)

Contact

Norman Maurer (norman@apache.org)

Download

You can download this project in either zip or tar formats.

You can also clone the project with Git by running: 

$ git clone git://github.com/normanmaurer/niosmtp
get the source code on GitHub : normanmaurer/niosmtp
